title: 「数で勝負だ」国枝調教師は最終週での反撃に闘志！フェブラリーSはシックスペンス想定外の逃げで9着 ("It's a numbers game," Trainer Kunieda full of fighting spirit for a counterattack in the final week! Sixpence's unexpected front-running effort in the February Stakes resulted in 9th place.)

【オーシャンS展望】復調したGⅠ馬、帰国初戦組、上がり馬、路線転向と例年以上の豪華メンバー集結！ ([Ocean S Outlook] G1 winner in form, horses returning from overseas for first race, rising stars, and those changing routes – a more luxurious lineup than usual assembled!)
【フェブラリーS】坂井瑠星「もたもたするところがあった」ダブルハートボンドを苦しめた〝初物〟 ([February S] Ryusei Sakai: "There were moments of hesitation," Double Heart Bond bothered by "something new.")
【中山記念・厩舎直送】「何とか名前入りのゼッケンを…」エコロヴァルツ陣営は悲願の重賞Vに意欲 ([Nakayama Kinen / Stable Direct] "Somehow, a bib with his name on it..." Ecoro Waltz camp eager for long-cherished graded race victory.)

【中山記念展望】復活期すGⅠ馬2頭、千八の鬼、昨年のハナ差2着馬など多彩な顔ぶれが激突！ ([Nakayama Kinen Outlook] Two G1 winners aiming for a comeback, an 1800m specialist, and last year's second-place finisher by a nose, among other diverse contenders, clash!)

【かきつばた記念】ダノンフィーゴが3馬身差圧勝！ 友道調教師は交流重賞初制覇「もっと勉強させていただきます」 ([Kakitsubata Kinen] Danon Figo wins overwhelmingly by 3 lengths! Trainer Tomomichi's first inter-track graded race victory: "I will study more.")

【チューリップ賞展望】武豊と新コンビの良血を筆頭に素質馬ズラリ！ 佐賀の女傑も加わって激戦ムード ([Tulip Sho Outlook] Led by a well-bred horse in a new combination with Yutaka Take, talented horses line up! Saga's heroine also joins, setting a fierce battle mood.)
【小倉大賞典】重賞ラスト騎乗の藤岡佑介はケイアイセナで悔いなし2着「思い描いた通りの競馬」 ([Kokura Daishoten] Yusuke Fujioka finishes 2nd with Keiai Sena in his last graded race ride with no regrets: "The race was exactly as I envisioned.")

JRAただ一人の現役1000勝・国枝栄調教師が今週末でラスト 後に続く存在は？ 意外な〝トップ〟も… (JRA's only active trainer with 1000 wins, Sakae Kunieda, concludes this weekend. Who will follow in his footsteps? Also an unexpected "top" contender...)
【フェブラリーS・ラップ分析】遅いラップになっても人気3頭が上位を独占 最後に求められた「力」は ([February S / Lap Analysis] Even with slow laps, the top three popular horses dominated the top positions. The "power" required at the end was...)
【チューリップ賞・厩舎直送】勢いに乗って重賞制覇を狙うソルパッサーレは「いい成長力を持っている」 ([Tulip Sho / Stable Direct] Sol Passare, aiming for a graded race victory riding on momentum, "has good growth potential.")
【浦和・ユングフラウ賞】高橋昭平がリクコウで強敵相手に重賞初挑戦「もちろん勝つつもりで乗ります」 ([Urawa / Jungfrau Sho] Shohei Takahashi takes on his first graded race challenge with Rikukou against strong rivals: "Of course, I'm riding to win.")
【オーシャンS・厩舎直送】阪神CレコードVのルガルは完全復調ムード「自分の競馬ができればここでも」 ([Ocean S / Stable Direct] Lugal, Hanshin C record-breaking winner, is in full form: "If he can run his own race, he can win here too.")
【フェブラリーS・河内洋のGⅠを斬る】まさに〝別格〟コスタノヴァ ルメールは自信満々の仕掛け ([February S / Hiroshi Kawachi's G1 Analysis] Costa Nova truly "exceptional," Lemaire's confident move.)
【フェブラリーS】吉田勝己オーナー「ルメール騎手は本当に凄い」 残り100メートルで“V確信” ([February S] Owner Katsumi Yoshida: "Jockey Lemaire is truly amazing," "certain of victory" with 100 meters remaining.)
【先週のJRA抹消馬】重賞2勝のヤマニンサルバム、25年シルクロードS覇者のエイシンフェンサーなど ([Last week's JRA retired horses] Yamnin Salvum (2 graded race wins), 2025 Silk Road S winner Eishin Fencer, etc.)
【フェブラリーS】コスタノヴァを連覇に導いたルメール騎手「スタートは心配でしたから、よかったです」 ([February S] Jockey Lemaire, who led Costa Nova to consecutive victories: "I was worried about the start, so it was good.")
【フェブラリーS・レースメモ】コスタノヴァの連覇はコパノリッキー、カフェファラオに次いで3頭目の偉業 ([February S / Race Memo] Costa Nova's consecutive victories is the third such achievement, following Copano Rickey and Cafe Pharoah.)
【チューリップ賞展望】良血アランカールが始動 母子制覇なるか タイセイボーグは手堅さが光る ([Tulip Sho Outlook] Well-bred Allan Carr starts. Can mother and child achieve victory? Taisei Borg's reliability shines.)
【かきつばた記念】川田将雅騎手「もともと持っているポテンシャルで勝ち切ってくれた」ダノンフィーゴが重賞初V ([Kakitsubata Kinen] Jockey Yuga Kawada: "He won decisively with the potential he originally possessed." Danon Figo wins first graded race.)
浦和競馬場で「ウマ娘プリティーダービー」コラボ開催 声優トークショーも大盛況 ("Uma Musume Pretty Derby" collaboration held at Urawa Racecourse, voice actor talk show also a great success.)
ジョアン・モレイラ騎手が4月7日から香港シーズン最終日の7月15日まで期間限定騎乗へ 香港JC発表 (Jockey Joao Moreira to ride for a limited period from April 7th until July 15th, the last day of the Hong Kong season, announced by Hong Kong JC.)

【オーシャンS】上り馬フリッカージャブの西園翔調教師が重賞で最後の親子対決 父親の西園正調教師は今週ラスト ([Ocean S] Trainer Sho Nishizono with rising star Flicker Jab in final father-son graded race showdown; father Trainer Tadashi Nishizono's last week.)

【競走伝】“地方の雄”が単勝万馬券で突然の大駆け 重賞昇格元年に鮮やかな3年ぶりV 06年オーシャンS ([Race Legend] "Local Hero" pulls off a sudden big upset with a huge winning ticket, brilliant victory after 3 years in the inaugural year of graded race promotion - 2006 Ocean S.)

【チューリップ賞展望】武豊騎手とアランカールが桜花賞切符をつかむ ソルパッサーレも末脚比べなら ([Tulip Sho Outlook] Jockey Yutaka Take and Allan Carr to seize the Oka Sho ticket; Sol Passare also in contention if it comes down to a sprint finish.)

【チューリップ賞】佐賀のニューヒロイン、サキドリトッケンが追い切り。真島元徳調教師「仕上がりは問題なく順調」 ([Tulip Sho] Saga's new heroine, Sakidori Tokken, had her final workout. Trainer Motonori Mashima: "Preparation is smooth without any problems.")
【フェブラリーS】コスタノヴァ 史上3頭目の連覇! ルメールは12年連続G1勝利「安全に乗りました」 ([February S] Costa Nova's third consecutive victory in history! Lemaire wins G1 for 12th consecutive year: "I rode safely.")
【ばんえい競馬】メムロボブサップがチャンピオンC連覇 重賞勝利数、獲得賞金で史上最多記録を更新! ([Banei Horse Racing] Memuro Bob Sapp wins Champion C consecutively, updates all-time record for graded race wins and prize money!)

【東京4R】マイネルグレートV!荻野極 現役48人目のJRA通算300勝「ファンの皆さまにも感謝」 ([Tokyo 4R] Meiner Great wins! Kiwami Ogino becomes 48th active jockey to reach 300 JRA career wins: "Thanks to all the fans.")

【オーシャンステークス展望】本来の姿に戻ったルガルがG1勝利の舞台で力を見せつける ([Ocean Stakes Outlook] Lugal, back in his original form, demonstrates his strength on the G1 winning stage.)
美浦から現役最多勝の国枝栄調教師らが引退 解散厩舎の軌跡 (Trainer Sakae Kunieda and other active top-winning trainers from Miho retire; track record of dissolved stable.)

【オーシャンS】ラストウィークに重賞Vなら3人目 西園正調教師が重賞ウィナー2頭で有終の美を飾る ([Ocean S] Trainer Tadashi Nishizono aims for a graceful finish with two graded race winners, potentially becoming the third to win a graded race in his last week.)
【オーシャンS想定騎手】ママコチャは川田騎手、ルガルは鮫島駿騎手 ([Ocean S Anticipated Jockeys] Mama Cocha with Kawada, Lugal with Shun Samejima.)

【フェブラリーＳ】コスタノヴァ 史上３頭目連覇！大外一気に差し切った ルメール「あ～良かった。出た」出遅れ癖も克服 ([February S] Costa Nova's third consecutive victory in history! Surged from the far outside to win decisively. Lemaire: "Ah, good. He broke well," overcoming his habit of slow starts.)
【中山記念展望】重賞連勝を狙う４歳馬カラマティアノスが主役を務める ([Nakayama Kinen Outlook] 4-year-old Kalamatianos, aiming for consecutive graded race wins, plays the leading role.)
2月28日阪神が騎手ラストデー 藤岡佑介騎手「よくこんなに勝てたな」 JRA通算1109勝 (February 28th is Jockey Yusuke Fujioka's last day at Hanshin: "I'm amazed I won so many," with 1109 career JRA wins.)
【チューリップ賞】タイセイボーグ 譲れない桜切符 今季初戦で重賞初Vへ ([Tulip Sho] Taisei Borg aims for unyielding Oka Sho ticket and first graded race victory in season opener.)
【チューリップ賞】母シンハライトは10年前にV アランカールが好仕上がり 斉藤崇調教師「本当にすごくここまで順調」 ([Tulip Sho] Dam Sinnahale won 10 years ago; Allan Carr in good condition. Trainer Takashi Saito: "Everything has been very smooth so far.")

人も馬も育てた国枝師 根底に流れる「石橋を叩いても渡らない」慎重さ (Trainer Kunieda, who raised both people and horses, had an underlying caution of "not crossing a stone bridge even after tapping it.")
【名古屋・かきつばた記念注目馬】かしわ記念やさきたま杯につながるレース 好メンバーの戦いを制すのは ([Nagoya / Kakitsubata Kinen Featured Horses] A race leading to the Kashiwa Kinen and Sakitama Hai. Who will win the battle of good contenders?)

【小倉大賞典】タガノデュード 末脚鮮やかＶ 古川吉ＪＲＡ通算６００勝「抜群の反応でした」満面の笑み ([Kokura Daishoten] Tagano Dude's brilliant late burst for victory. Yoshi Furukawa reaches 600th career JRA win: "The response was exceptional," with a beaming smile.)
【小倉大賞典】タガノデュード 26戦目で重賞初制覇! 古川吉のJRA通算600勝飾った ([Kokura Daishoten] Tagano Dude's first graded race victory in 26th start! Marks Yoshi Furukawa's 600th career JRA win.)
【中山記念】カラマティアノス 重賞連勝で実力証明だ 中山金杯で初Ｖ「馬は良くなっています」 ([Nakayama Kinen] Kalamatianos to prove ability with consecutive graded race wins; first victory in Nakayama Kimpai: "The horse is getting better.")
【フェブラリーS】ノーザンファーム・中島文彦GM コスタノヴァ連覇にひと安心「本当に良かった」 ([February S] Northern Farm GM Fumihiko Nakajima relieved by Costa Nova's consecutive victories: "It was truly good.")
【オーシャンS展望】G1馬ルガルとママコチャが激突! ([Ocean S Outlook] G1 winners Lugal and Mama Cocha clash!)

【名古屋競馬 かきつばた記念】ダノンフィーゴ 直線突き放して重賞初V 売得金はレコード更新 ([Nagoya Horse Racing Kakitsubata Kinen] Danon Figo pulls away in the stretch for first graded race victory; betting turnover sets new record.)

17年皐月賞３着のダンビュライトが腸捻転で死す 12歳 18年ＡＪＣＣなど重賞２勝 (Danburite, 3rd in 2017 Satsuki Sho, dies at 12 of intestinal torsion; two graded race wins including 2018 AJC Cup.)

【オーシャンS・三戸の特注馬】中山開幕週の馬場でスピードを生かす ルージュラナキラが強敵相手に一発狙う ([Ocean S / Mito's Featured Horse] Rouge Lanakira, utilizing speed on the Nakayama opening week track, aims for a shot against strong rivals.)

【令月Ｓ】コンクイスタ 後続突き放してＯＰ２勝目 吉岡師「もまれると見せる難しさが今後の課題」 ([Reigetsu S] Conquista pulls away from rivals for second Open class win. Trainer Yoshioka: "The difficulty he shows when getting squeezed is a future challenge.")

【競走伝】日本競馬で語り継がれる“永遠の女傑”伝説の始まり!5馬身差の圧勝で重賞初制覇 96年チューリップ賞 ([Race Legend] The beginning of the legend of the "Eternal Heroine" recounted in Japanese horse racing! Wins first graded race decisively by 5 lengths - 1996 Tulip Sho.)

Pinatubo filly smashes record price at Magic Millions Tasmania

Stokes Racing has had a massive week with Stretan Ruler, Rebel Tuesday, and Kazaru all winning stakes races. With all three coming in at good value prices, $220,000, $30,000 and NZ$27,500, affordability is a key factor when it comes to buying yearlings for the stable.

There was a solid morning of trials at Rosehill on Monday, where R. Listed Magic Millions Wyong 2YO Classic winner Paradoxium led up a trio of impressive 2-year-olds from the Bjorn Baker stable, while Hidden Motive cruised to a strong victory ahead of kicking off his autumn.

Ka Ying Rising smashed the course record on his way to 18 successive victories and the Hong Kong-trained record of wins in a row in Sunday’s G1 Queen’s Silver Jubilee Cup. On the 11-race card, Zac Purton won five races and Matthew Poon won three, dominating the jockey’s ranks. Trainer Frankie Lor also celebrated a treble.
The 2026 Magic Millions Tasmanian Yearling Sale takes place on Monday, where vendors are hopeful that the robust selling action that has swept the sales season so far reaches the Apple Isle.

A dominant Silver Slipper win has thrust Stretan Ruler into Golden Slipper contention - and handed Wild Ruler the breakthrough first-crop stakes winner every young sire needs. Bought for $220,000 at Inglis Easter, he’s a timely reminder that value still lives beneath the million-dollar spotlight.

Bought for $22,000 and resold for $100,000, Streisand is now a $1.5 million G1 Blue Diamond winner. Her rise is a pinhooking triumph - and a deeply meaningful result for her late breeder, Don Byrne, whose belief laid the foundation.

Streisand used her experience to win the G1 Blue Diamond Stakes, a second win in the race for trainer Clinton McDonald. Stretan Ruler won the G2 Silver Slipper Stakes to become his first season sire Wild Ruler's first stakes winner, and he was part of a dual state stakes double for trainer Phillip Stokes.
Kia Ora Stud, Godolphin and Yulong all had big Group 1 wins to celebrate on Saturday as the three big farms took out the G1 Oakleigh Plate, G1 Futurity Stakes, and G1 New Zealand Oaks.
